com.here.android.mpa.ftcr

Interface FTCRNavigationManager.FTCRNavigationManagerListener

  • Enclosing class:
    FTCRNavigationManager

    public static interface FTCRNavigationManager.FTCRNavigationManagerListener
    An interface for responding to navigation events sent by the FTCRNavigationManager.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onCurrentManeuverChanged(FTCRRoute.FTCRManeuver currentManeuver, FTCRRoute.FTCRManeuver nextManeuver)
      Called when the current (upcoming) maneuver is updated.
      void onDestinationReached()
      Called when the destination of turn-by-turn navigation is reached.
      void onRerouteBegin()
      Callback for Re-route begin event.
      void onRerouteEnd(FTCRRoute newRoute, FTCRRouter.ErrorResponse error)
      Callback for Re-route end event.
      void onStopoverReached(int index)
      Called when the stopover is reached.

    • Method Detail

      • onCurrentManeuverChanged

        void onCurrentManeuverChanged(FTCRRoute.FTCRManeuver currentManeuver,
                              FTCRRoute.FTCRManeuver nextManeuver)
        Called when the current (upcoming) maneuver is updated.

        The "current" maneuver is the upcoming, or next, maneuver to be taken. The "next" maneuver is actually the maneuver to be taken after the current maneuver.

        Parameters:
        currentManeuver - The current (upcoming) maneuver to be made.
        nextManeuver - The maneuver to be made AFTER THE CURRENT MANEUVER.

      • onStopoverReached

        void onStopoverReached(int index)
        Called when the stopover is reached.
        Parameters:
        index - The stopover index.

      • onDestinationReached

        void onDestinationReached()
        Called when the destination of turn-by-turn navigation is reached.

      • onRerouteBegin

        void onRerouteBegin()
        Callback for Re-route begin event.

      • onRerouteEnd

        void onRerouteEnd(FTCRRoute newRoute,
                  FTCRRouter.ErrorResponse error)
        Callback for Re-route end event.

        Note, in order to see new route on the map, old FTCRMapRoute should be removed from the map and new mapRoute added to the map.

        Parameters:
        newRoute - The FTCRRoute object.
        error - A FTCRRouter.ErrorResponse indicating the error code for the route calculation
